sentences.sContent: Strychnine, arsenic, and opium are poison.
sentences.sCn: 马钱子碱、砷和鸦片都是毒药。

sentences.sContent: One day, a friend offered her a pipe and opium.
sentences.sContent_eng: One day, a friend offered her a pipe and opium.
sentences.sCn: 一天，一个朋友给了她一根烟管和鸦片。

sentences.sContent: This reminds us of the 150 kilograms of opium that Siam presented to his court in 1584.
sentences.sContent_eng: This reminds us of the 150 kilograms of opium that Siam presented to his court in 1584.
sentences.sCn: 这使我们联想起1584年暹罗国曾经向明朝廷进贡150千克鸦片的史料记载。

phrases.pCn: n. [史]鸦片战争（1839-1842年中英间的战争）

trans.tranOther: a powerful illegal drug made from poppy seeds. Drugs made from opium are used to reduce severe pain.
